instruction:
1) Get the configuration settings of the transformation from Table to SpreadsheetMLSimplified.
2) Apply the transformation to the model at path '/Users/zakariahachm/Downloads/atl_zoo/Grafcet2PetriNet/Models/PNML2PetriNet_example.xmi' to PNML model.
Get the configuration of the Activity-to-BPMN transformation, then apply it to /Users/zakariahachm/Downloads/atl_zoo/Ant2Maven/example/build1Ant.xmi to Maven model.
Transform /Users/zakariahachm/Downloads/atl_zoo/RSS2ATOM/XML/Exemple1-XML.xmi to RSS; Retrieve the configuration of the transformation from KM3 to EMF.

Get the configuration for the KM3-to-DOT transformation.
Apply /Users/zakariahachm/Downloads/atl_zoo/JavaSource2Table/javaSource-example.xmi to a Table model.

Transform the model at /Users/zakariahachm/Downloads/atl_zoo/Table2MicrosoftOfficeExcel/modelsExamples/TableModelExample.xmi to SpreadsheetMLSimplified.
Retrieve the configuration for the UML to JAVA transformation.

- Retrieve the configuration for the transformation from a relational database to KM3 (target: KM3).
- Retrieve the configuration for the transformation from XML to DXF (target: DXF).
Show me the configuration of the UML-to-JAVA transformation and then transform './examples/input.xmi' to JAVA model.

Show me the configuration settings of the DSL to KM3 transformation.
Apply /Users/zakariahachm/Downloads/atl_zoo/Geometry/cube.xmi to DXF model.

1) Retrieve configuration of the transformation from Table to TabularHTML.
2) Apply to '/Users/zakariahachm/Downloads/atl_zoo/PathExp2PetriNet/Models/textualpathexp-example.xmi' as PathExp model.

Show me the configuration settings of the transformation that converts a Table to a SpreadsheetMLSimplified model, and then show me the configuration settings of the transformation that converts a UMLDI to an SVG.
Retrieve the configuration of the transformation that converts a Book to a Publication; then retrieve the configuration of the transformation that converts a PathExp to a PetriNet.

get configuration for the Class to Relational transformation
apply './examples/input.xmi' to JAVA model

- Get the configuration settings of the KM3 to OWL transformation
- Get the configuration settings of the UML to MOF transformation
Transform /Users/zakariahachm/Downloads/atl_zoo/PathExp2PetriNet/Models/pathexp-example.xmi to PetriNet. Retrieve configuration for the produced PetriNet.
Retrieve the configuration settings of the transformation that converts PetriNet to PathExp; Retrieve the configuration settings of the transformation that converts XML to SpreadsheetMLSimplified.
Retrieve configuration details of the XML to Make transformation, then retrieve configuration details of the redundant inheritance with context transformation.

Get the configuration of the XML-to-PNML transformation.
Apply /Users/zakariahachm/Downloads/atl_zoo/Make2Ant/example/makeFile.xmi — Make model.
Show me the configuration settings of the transformation that transforms Families to Persons and then show me the configuration settings of the transformation that transforms Maven to Ant

1. Show configuration of the transformation from PNML to XML.
2. Show configuration of the transformation from PetriNet to XML.
Show me the configuration of the first transformation that converts a source model to XML, then show me the configuration of the second transformation that converts a source model to XML.
Show me the configuration settings of the transformation from a UML class diagram to a UML profile, and then show me the configuration settings of the transformation from an Ant to XML.

- apply /Users/zakariahachm/Downloads/atl_zoo/Make2Ant/example/makeFile.xmi (TARGET: Make model)
- get configuration information for the Make to KM3 transformation

Retrieve the configuration of the Partial to totalRoleB transformation, then apply Partial to totalRoleB transformation to /Users/zakariahachm/Downloads/atl_zoo/METAH2ACME/MODELS/example-METAH.xmi as ACME model.

Show me the configuration of the Activity to BPMN transformation.
Apply the transformation to ./examples/input.xmi producing an OWL model.

Apply the transformation to ./examples/input.xmi; target: SVG.
Get the configuration for the transformation from SVG to Persons.

1. Transform the Activity model ./examples/input.xmi into a BPMN model.
2. Retrieve the configuration for the transformation from Activity to BPMN.

- Get the configuration of the transformation from SimpleClass to SimpleRDBMS.
- Get the configuration of the transformation from Table to SVGBarChart.

Transform '/Users/zakariahachm/Downloads/atl_zoo/ListMetamodelRefactoring/SampleModels/RootA.xmi' to PathExp model, then Retrieve the configuration for the transformation from TextualPathExp to PathExp.
Get the configuration of the transformation that converts XML to SpreadsheetMLSimplified, then Get the configuration of the transformation that converts XML to Make.

- Show me the configuration settings of the transformation that converts KM3 to Problem
- Show me the configuration settings of the transformation that converts Uml to Amble
Retrieve the configuration of the Ant-to-XML transformation and then retrieve the configuration of the UML-to-JAVA transformation.

- Get the configuration settings of the transformation from Families to Persons (target: Persons model)
- Get the configuration settings of the transformation from XML to PNML (target: PNML model)

- Transform /Users/zakariahachm/Downloads/atl_zoo/Make2Ant/example/antFile.xmi to XML model
- Get configuration for the UML to MOF transformation

- Apply the KM3 model at '/Users/zakariahachm/Downloads/atl_zoo/KM32Problem/Models/test-KM3.xmi' to KM32Problem
- Get the KM3-to-DSL configuration

- Transform /Users/zakariahachm/Downloads/atl_zoo/SimpleClass2SimpleRDBMS/Sample-SimpleClass.xmi into a SimpleRDBMS model.
- Retrieve the configuration of the PathExp to TextualPathExp transformation.
Transform the XML model at '/Users/zakariahachm/Downloads/atl_zoo/MySQL2KM3/Models/euro2004-XML.xmi' to a MySQL model, then Retrieve configuration for the MySQL-to-XML transformation.

1. Get the configuration for the METAH to ACME transformation.
2. Apply the XML to SpreadsheetMLSimplified transformation to /Users/zakariahachm/Downloads/atl_zoo/MicrosoftOfficeExcelInjector/modelsExamples/ExcelXMLFileExample.xml: SpreadsheetMLSimplified model

Apply /Users/zakariahachm/Downloads/atl_zoo/Make2Ant/example/makeFileMake.xmi to Ant model
Get configuration for XML-to-Ant transformation

1) Apply the model at /Users/zakariahachm/Downloads/atl_zoo/Table2MicrosoftOfficeExcel/modelsExamples/TableModelExample.xmi to SpreadsheetMLSimplified.
2) Retrieve configuration details for the UML to MOF_2 transformation.

Show me the configuration of the XML-to-GeoTrans transformation.
Apply /Users/zakariahachm/Downloads/atl_zoo/Uml2Amble/UMLDI.xmi to Amble model.
Show the configuration of the UML to OWL transformation, then show the configuration of the Table to SpreadsheetMLSimplified transformation.

Retrieve the configuration for the KM3-to-DOT transformation.
Apply the Grafcet-to-PetriNet transformation to /Users/zakariahachm/Downloads/atl_zoo/Grafcet2PetriNet/Models/example.xmi into a PetriNet model.
Show me the configuration of the transformation from JavaSource to Table, then Show me the configuration of the transformation from Mantis to XML.

- Transform the textual path expression at /Users/zakariahachm/Downloads/atl_zoo/PathExp2PetriNet/Models/textualpathexp-example.xmi into a PathExp model.
- Retrieve the configuration for the PathExp-to-XML transformation.

Show me the configuration of the PetriNet to PNML transformation.
Apply the KM3-to-EMF transformation with /Users/zakariahachm/Downloads/atl_zoo/KM32EMF/Sample-KM3.xmi to EMF model.

- Show me the configuration settings for the transformation: SimpleClass to SimpleRDBMS.
- Show me the configuration settings for the transformation: Make to Ant.
Retrieve the configuration of the KM3-to-DOT transformation and retrieve the configuration of the XML-to-Book transformation
Show me the configuration settings of the transformation that converts XML to R2ML, then show me the configuration settings of the transformation that converts PNML to XML.
Transform /Users/zakariahachm/Downloads/atl_zoo/PathExp2PetriNet/Models/pathexp-example.xmi into PetriNet, then Retrieve the configuration of the Mantis-to-XML transformation.

1. Show configuration of the XML to R2ML transformation.
2. Apply /Users/zakariahachm/Downloads/atl_zoo/Geometry/cube.xmi; Target model: DXF.

Retrieve the configuration of the transformation from source to target model.
Inspect the configuration of the transformation from KM3 to DOT model.

Apply the Measure to Table transformation to /Users/zakariahachm/Downloads/atl_zoo/Measure2Table/models/example-Measure.xmi into a Table model and then Get the configuration for the XML to SpreadsheetMLSimplified transformation.

- get the configuration of the Activity-to-BPMN transformation.
- apply /Users/zakariahachm/Downloads/atl_zoo/Grafcet2PetriNet/Models/Grafcet2PetriNet_example.xmi; TARGET: Grafcet model.

Show the configuration for the Ant-to-Maven transformation.
Review the configuration for the XML-to-Ant transformation.
Retrieve the configuration settings of the transformation that converts Atom to RSS, then retrieve the configuration settings of the transformation that converts Class to Relational model.
Transform /Users/zakariahachm/Downloads/atl_zoo/Maven2Ant/example/mavenFile.xmi to Ant model and then Get the configuration for the transformation that converts XML to RSS.

Transform the file at /Users/zakariahachm/Downloads/atl_zoo/MakePartialRoleTotal/MakingPartialRolesTotalB/with_context/InputModels/exampleB-KM3.xmi from Partial to totalRoleB; Retrieve configuration details for converting PNML to XML.
get the configuration for the first transformation (source to target); apply the transformation to /Users/zakariahachm/Downloads/atl_zoo/MySQL2KM3/Models/euro2004-MySQL.xmi as KM3 model

- Show me the configuration of the transformation that converts XML to Book.
- Transform the file at '/Users/zakariahachm/Downloads/atl_zoo/MySQL2KM3/Models/euro2004-MySQL.xmi' into a KM3 model.

- Transform the model at '/Users/zakariahachm/Downloads/atl_zoo/Grafcet2PetriNet/Models/PNML2XML_example.xmi' to a PNML model.
- Retrieve the configuration information for the KM3-to-EMF transformation.
